expected_behavior: Agent dispatches to 'New server' mode based on a service name argument
Agent consults live FastMCP v3 documentation via Context7 or WebFetch before implementation
Agent runs Phase 1 (Research & Plan): understands GitHub API, identifies core operations, notes auth requirements, checks for existing MCP servers
Agent completes the Architecture Checklist (auth needed, transport, background tasks, OpenAPI spec, composition)
Agent designs a tool inventory of 5-15 tools with names in snake_case verb_noun format
Agent runs Phase 2 (Scaffold) using 'wagents new mcp <name>' to create the project directory structure
Agent ensures root pyproject.toml includes the new server in [tool.uv.workspace] members
Agent produces a tool/resource/prompt inventory table before proceeding to implementation
